title: SEVERE recv failed什么意思？
author: qwbestplayer
txt_content:
2013-03-08 18:03:01 [SEVERE] [Metrics] Software caused connection abort: recv failed
2013-03-08 18:39:08 [SEVERE] [Metrics] Server returned HTTP response code: 504 for URL: http://mcstats.org/report/Spigot


什么意思？怎么回事？

replies.txt_content: 这个你试试换图一下再看看出现这个错误没？
